column1: Very clean hotel. Nice breakfast. Brand new. Location may be out a little bit
column2: but no worries Yandex Taxi Is easily available.

column1: Yangi otel ekan hammasi yaxshi normalno
column2: lekin terminal iwlamaskan wekl QR Code chiqarib berolmadi telegramdan junataman deb vada berdi junatmadi. Svejiy yangi nomerla. Bazi bir kamchilik bor tugirlab qo'ysa bo'ladigan eshikni tegini yopish kere dahlizdan ovoz va yorug'lik kirib turibdi. Zavtraki yaxshi.
